## Description

Shamir will be proud when you solve this.

---

## Solve

In Shamirâ€™s scheme, you need a threshold number of shares to reconstruct the original secret. Since the challenge provided at least two shares, that was enough.

Instead of implementing Lagrange interpolation by hand, I used an online reconstruction tool:
https://iancoleman.io/shamir/

I pasted the provided shares into the input boxes and the tool immediately reconstructed the secret.

![alt text](image.png)


The flag was: ctf{d6b72529c6177d8f648ae85f624a24d6f1edce5ca29bd7cc0b888e117a123892}
